scenario_text.value: What should we do about Shuuji?

I, I want to save him... *huff* *huff*...
I need to...be useful to him...

Lopmon? What’s wrong? You seem to be in
pain...

I don’t know... It’s just... I want...want to
be of use to him...

Okay, I got it. Just rest for now, okay? Take
a second to recuperate.
I’ll try to try, at least...

(The way Lopmon’s getting weaker isn’t
normal. What’s going on?)
